original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: kāyasasaggam sādiyana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: kāyasasaggam sādiyana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjana paccayā āpattiyo sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjana paccayā āpattiyo sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca
